description:
Seizure Warning.
 rrrgggbbb reminds you of the three primary colors so you dont have to remember!
A website to help with your night time needs. I Cant Sleep helps you count sheep as you drift off to sleep...

Fight with a 12 year old!
 We all know twelve year old kids are the nicest people to meet on the internet so go and meet some virtual twelve year olds!
Play an accurate simluation of life without Net Neutrality, brough to you by Comcast themselves!
Check out the scale of the universe. Its a scientific display of how tiny and insignificant you are!

Want an excuse to do no work! Look no further!
 Fake update is a fake windows update screen because we all know how much fun those are
A game to test your color choices. How close can you get the colors?
A website to make big ass messages and spam them in discord to bring down their mighty servers.
Pull my finger. I dare you
You're put in a location on google maps. Now figure out where you are!
Race through wikapedias terabytes, you start at one page and end at another. First person there wins.

What would happen if google's website had gravity? 
 Well wonder no more because with this website you can know!
Want to see branching, uhh lights Well you've come to the right place!
Unlike google gravity, this is google without gravity!
Have a real urge to destroy something? Just drop a picture in and watch it turn into something out of a blender! (No live chickens)
Want to see branching, but smaller? Well you've come to the right place!
Just need to hear something nice today? Get a lovely compliment from a robot.
The worlds largest image. Take a look around
Up for a space story? Nasa's "prospect" is for you!
Ever played fruit ninja and thought "this game looks weird, it should be 8 bit", well neither did we but here it is!
